pageTitle: Itinerary for Wednesday, June 14, 2017 | Prime Minister of Canada
articleHtml:
Itinerary for the Prime Minister, Justin Trudeau, for Wednesday, June 14, 2017:

Ottawa, Ontario

10:00 a.m. The Prime Minister will attend the National Caucus meeting.

12:00 p.m. The Prime Minister will attend an event commemorating the Centenary of the dedication of Centre Block.

Rotunda
Centre Block

Note for media:

  • Photo opportunity

2:00 p.m. The Prime Minister will attend Question Period.

4:00 p.m. The Prime Minister will attend the Flag Raising Ceremony for Pride Month and will make an announcement.

Front Lawn
Parliament Hill

Note for media:

  • Photo opportunity
